alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Harrison (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 9:29AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Harrison, south central Floyd, northern Spencer, southeastern Oldham, western Shelby, Meade, southwestern Henry, Jefferson, north central Hardin, east central Breckinridge and Bullitt Counties through 1015 AM EST/915 AM CST/... At 929 AM EST/829 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brandenburg, moving northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Valley Station and Pleasure Ridge Par around 940 AM EST. Shively, Pioneer Village, Hollyvilla, South Park View, Fairdale, Okolona and St. Dennis around 945 AM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Louisville, Audubon Park, West Buechel, Watterson Park, Lynnview, Hollow Creek, Seneca Gardens, Parkway Village, Strathmoor Village, Rolling Fields, Jeffersontown, St. Matthews, Lyndon, Middletown, Douglass Hills, Hurstbourne, Graymoor-Devondale, Windy Hills, Anchorage, Hurstbourne Acres and Worthington Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
